en: Find a way out of the prison cell.

Hey uh.. I need you to uh heh heh get some of those heh [c gold]rats[c white].. heh yea get some of those [c gold]rat tails[c white] for me hehuh.

You wanna get out of here right hehhe? I got your [c gold]key[c white] right hehhe here!

You better heh get in that [c gold]sewer[c white] then heehuh!
Stepping on this orb will set your spawn point. If you [c red]die[c white], you will revive here.\n\nYou will lose some of your [c gold]gold[c white] when dying.
